page.title: 15Our questionnaire
page.content: In May 1985 we sent our questionnaire out to all 29 pupils in our class.It asked in 7 questions about transport,work,leisure,housing and village activities. On transport,only 2 people did not own a car,15 families had one car and 12 had two cars.Most people(13) had a foreign car,9 owned British Leyland.Only 5 families did not travel to work by car.In 23 families both adults worked,and no one was out of work,with 24 working outside Macclesfield.A Leisure Centre was used by 22 families, Macclesfield (15),Congleton(4),Bollington(2) Wilmslow(1).Detached houses we lived in by 17,semi-detached(9) and terraced (3).Pre 1950 housing was 12 and after was 17.Both 10 families who have always lived in Sutton and 19 who have arrived since 1970,enjoy living here.Families(27) join in village life
